name: Car Offroad Winter Prado Drivi
description:
Car Offroad Winter Prado Driving is a game which can give you feel of driving real car. Drive your favorite prado and show your car, driving skills There are some vehicles which must be noticed and respected during driving process. Official vehicles, ambulances and army vehicles must be given way before we take the way. Also environmental conditions such as heavy and extreme weather conditions also stop an adventurous racer to drive patiently.
Features
- 3D environment
- Easy driving controls
- Many engaging levels
- Advanced UAZ physics
- Beautiful graphics
